SESSION_ID.description: Put your SESSION_ID here. Must start with MALVIN-XD~, or get it from: https://github.com/kingmalvn/Jinwoo-bot

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter your phone number with country code (e.g., 2637xxxxxxxx)

TIMEZONE.description: Enter your timezone. Google if unsure, or leave default.

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: IMPORTANT: Generate your GitHub token correctly. Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens, select 'Tokens (classic)', click 'Generate new token', give a note, choose 'No expiration', and select 'repo' scope. Copy it here. If using a single token for multiple bots, change the owner number to avoid mixups.
